trans-unit.source: Your first step is to create a new account to use for the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Your first step is to create a new account to use for the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You can use the FREE Sandbox plan, it's perfect for this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You can use the FREE Sandbox plan, it's perfect for this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: To sign up for a Pusher account
trans-unit.target: To sign up for a Pusher account

trans-unit.source: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal][].
trans-unit.target: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal][].

trans-unit.source: In the lower pane of the management portal, click **New**.
trans-unit.target: In the lower pane of the management portal, click **New**.

trans-unit.source: ![command-bar-new][command-bar-new]
trans-unit.target: ![command-bar-new][command-bar-new]

trans-unit.source: Click **Store**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Store**.

trans-unit.source: ![pusher-store][pusher-store]
trans-unit.target: ![pusher-store][pusher-store]

trans-unit.source: In the **Choose an Add-on** dialog, select **Pusher** and click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: In the **Choose an Add-on** dialog, select **Pusher** and click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: In the **Personalize Add-on** dialog select the **Pusher** plan you want to sign up for.
trans-unit.target: In the **Personalize Add-on** dialog select the **Pusher** plan you want to sign up for.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name to identify your **Pusher** service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of **Pusher**.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name to identify your **Pusher** service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of **Pusher**.

trans-unit.source: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.
trans-unit.target: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.

trans-unit.source: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.
trans-unit.target: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.

trans-unit.source: ![store-screen-1][store-screen-1]
trans-unit.target: ![store-screen-1][store-screen-1]

trans-unit.source: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.
trans-unit.target: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.

trans-unit.source: Click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: Click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: On the **Review Purchase** tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.
trans-unit.target: On the **Review Purchase** tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.

trans-unit.source: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.
trans-unit.target: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.

trans-unit.source: After you click the check mark, your Pusher account will begin the provisioning process.
trans-unit.target: After you click the check mark, your Pusher account will begin the provisioning process.

trans-unit.source: ![store-screen-2][store-screen-2]
trans-unit.target: ![store-screen-2][store-screen-2]

trans-unit.source: After confirming your purchase you are redirected to the add-ons dashboard and you will see the message **Purchasing Pusher**.
trans-unit.target: After confirming your purchase you are redirected to the add-ons dashboard and you will see the message **Purchasing Pusher**.

trans-unit.source: ![store-screen-3][store-screen-3]
trans-unit.target: ![store-screen-3][store-screen-3]

trans-unit.source: Your Pusher account is provisioned immediately and you will see the message **Successfully purchased Add-On Pusher**.
trans-unit.target: Your Pusher account is provisioned immediately and you will see the message **Successfully purchased Add-On Pusher**.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been created and you are now ready to use the Pusher service.
trans-unit.target: Your account has been created and you are now ready to use the Pusher service.

trans-unit.source: To modify your subscription plan or see the Pusher contact settings, click the name of your Pusher service to open the Pusher add-ons dashboard.
trans-unit.target: To modify your subscription plan or see the Pusher contact settings, click the name of your Pusher service to open the Pusher add-ons dashboard.

trans-unit.source: ![pusher-add-on-dashboard][pusher-add-on-dashboard]
trans-unit.target: ![pusher-add-on-dashboard][pusher-add-on-dashboard]

trans-unit.source: When using Pusher you will need to supply your Pusher app connection settings.
trans-unit.target: When using Pusher you will need to supply your Pusher app connection settings.

trans-unit.source: To find your Pusher connection settings
trans-unit.target: To find your Pusher connection settings

trans-unit.source: Click **Connection Info**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Connection Info**.

trans-unit.source: ![pusher-connection-info-button][pusher-connection-info-button]
trans-unit.target: ![pusher-connection-info-button][pusher-connection-info-button]

trans-unit.source: In the *Connection info* dialog you will see your app ID, key and secret.
trans-unit.target: In the *Connection info* dialog you will see your app ID, key and secret.

trans-unit.source: You will use these values later in the tutorial so copy them for late use.
trans-unit.target: You will use these values later in the tutorial so copy them for late use.

trans-unit.source: ![pusher-connection-info][pusher-connection-info]
trans-unit.target: ![pusher-connection-info][pusher-connection-info]

trans-unit.source: For more information on getting started with Pusher, see [Understanding Pusher][].
trans-unit.target: For more information on getting started with Pusher, see [Understanding Pusher][].
